purpose: To provide developers with an intuitive and efficient environment for the rapid construction of intelligent agents.
principle: Builds on a combination of RAG for knowledge retrieval and LLMOps for operationalizing large language models, facilitating agent creation.
reusability: Offers a modular toolkit with components that can be easily integrated into existing systems, supports API-based interactions.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability, primarily supports TypeScript environment.
name: Launch
description: Launching the "Agent Creation Toolkit", providing developers with an intuitive and efficient Development Environment, supporting the rapid construction of intelligent agents. The toolkit will integrate RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) Knowledge Base and LLMOps toolchain.
highlight: Integrates RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) Knowledge Base and LLMOps toolchain for rapid intelligent agent development.
